SELECT * FROM REVIEW_FILE WHERE FILE_STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND REVIEW_NO = #{rno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT ORDER_NO FROM ORDERS WHERE ORDER_NO IN (SELECT ORDER_NO FROM ORDER_CART WHERE CART_NO IN (SELECT CART_NO FROM CART WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND CART_STATUS = 'N') GROUP BY ORDER_NO) AND ORDER_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NO IN(SELECT PRODUCT_NO FROM CART WHERE CART_NO IN(SELECT CART_NO FROM ORDER_CART WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}))
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEW_COUNT = REVIEW_COUNT + 1 WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} AND REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_NO , REVIEW_TITLE , REVIEW_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(REVIEW_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "REVIEW_DATE" , REVIEW_COUNT , REVIEW_GRADE , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_ID , SUBS_STATUS FROM REVIEW JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN ORDERS USING (ORDER_NO) WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} AND REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT PRODUCT_NO FROM CART WHERE CART_NO IN(SELECT CART_NO FROM ORDER_CART WHERE ORDER_NO = (SELECT ORDER_NO FROM REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{rno}))
